main event: On June 20, 1953, an observer in Shawnee, Kansas reported seeing two large, solid, silver discs in the sky for approximately 10 seconds.
interesting points: The objects appeared to be connected by something,The objects were described as having a diameter of about 30 feet, and resembled two wagon wheels overlapping,The sighting occurred in daylight, and the objects were brighter than the background of the sky,The witness estimated a speed between 600 and 700 mph,The objects vanished completely without a trace.
sighted object: Two solid discs resembling wagon wheels
witness description: A housewife sitting on her front porch.
